document_data.mainbody:
erevan Crell was a Nentyarch of Narfell during the time of the Crell Dynasty.
Derevan ruled from  to .
Derevans father, and predecessor as Nentyarch, was Thargaun Crell, the first in the line of Crell rulers. He was the firstborn son of his father. Derevan himself had two sons, the second of which, Arthauld would succeed him on the throne.
